All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Constants
    Constants used throughout MotionInput code
    HandsCamera
    Sets up the GLSurfaceView and NewCameraInput with Hands
    HandsConstants
    Contains the constants used by MotionInput for the Hands module
    HandsGestureHandler
    This class uses MediaPipe Hands data to determine if a specific gesture (e.g.
    MainAccessibilityService
    MotionInput Android's main accessibility service
    MainActivity
    Main activity of MotionInput Android
    MediaPipeRenderer
    Adapted from HandsResultGIRenderer in MediaPipe Hands Android Example A custom implementation of ResultGlRenderer to render HandsResult
    ModuleCamera
    Interface for a Camera, an object that combines a module with a NewCameraInput
    NewCameraInput
    Edited version of MediaPipe's Android CameraInput Changes made: Renamed to NewCameraInput Added cameraPermissionsGranted() Added permissionsAlreadyGranted check in NewCameraInput constructor Original documentation: The camera component that takes the camera input and produces MediaPipe TextureFrame objects.
    NewCameraInput.CameraFacing
    Represents the direction the camera faces relative to device screen.
    NewCameraXPreviewHelper
    Edited version of MediaPipe's CameraXPreviewHelper Changes made: CameraXPreviewHelper -> NewCameraXPreviewHelper private -> public void startCamera( Context context, LifecycleOwner lifecycleOwner, CameraFacing cameraFacing,
    OnboardingActivity
    MotionInput Android's onboarding activity This is the app's launcher activity.
    OnboardingPagerAdapter
    MotionInput implementation of PagerAdapter to create the pages you swipe through during onboarding
    Overlay
    MotionInput implementation of an overlay to show the cursor
    PersistentBackgroundService
    A dummy lifecycle service that runs in the background and is used to instantiate a NewCameraInput
